snippet: Even when wrong, Edward Koch was brave and earnest in ways I didn’t at first comprehend.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author and former columnist Jim Sleeper describes his experiences excoriating Edward Koch throughout his 12 years as New York City mayor; says he came to believe Koch was brave and earnest in ways that took him years to fully understand.
lead_paragraph: Even when wrong, Edward Koch was brave and earnest in ways I didn’t at first comprehend.

headline.seo: Ed Koch, the King of New York
